name: Bixby Beatdown: Act I
description:
WARNING: This game contains flashing lights and screen shake effects that may trigger photosensitive epilepsy.

Bixby Beatdown is an action platformer boss rush set in a high school where everything is going wrong. People are disappearing, rooms are changing shape, and no one seems to notice...

The only way to find out the cause of the disappearances is to fight monsters and super-powered students alike. But be careful, someone or something is observing your every move...

Features:

  • 6+ bosses!
  • Solve a mystery!
  • Is someone going to die?
  • Every character is based on a real person!
  • Old-timey password save system!

Currently, only Act I is available. Act II will be released for free later on.

If you have any feedback or suggestions, leave me a comment!
